home.title: Welcome to AmalCare
home.subtitle: We are AmalCare eG – a placement agency organized as a cooperative for nursing professionals from Morocco.
home.description: What makes us special: we don't just mediate, we prepare, accompany and integrate. From the first lesson in Rabat to successful arrival at a German care facility.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To offer nursing professionals real prospects. Institutions. And bring people together on both sides for the long term.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: Many placement agencies end with a signed contract. That's where our work really begins.
whatWeDo.details: We prepare nursing professionals linguistically, professionally and personally to live and work in Germany. And we help institutions attract motivated specialists who are not only competent, but also culturally and humanly suitable.
whatWeDo.focus: Everything we do is focused on one thing: connecting responsibly. For strong care.

forNurses.title: Language, Care, Perspective
forNurses.subtitle: FOR NURSES FROM MOROCCO
forNurses.cardDescription: Professional nursing careers in Germany with comprehensive preparation and support

forInstitutions.title: Hands-on Care Practice
forInstitutions.subtitle: FOR STUDENTS IN MOROCCO
forInstitutions.cardDescription: Start your nursing education journey with hands-on training in Morocco

process.title: Placement Process
process.subtitle: PLACEMENT PROCESS
process.description: We accompany – before, during and after placement
process.details: AmalCare handles the entire placement process: from selecting suitable candidates through language and professional preparation, recognition and visa to arrival in Germany. Even after the start, we remain a reliable contact – for nursing professionals and institutions.

whatMakesUsSpecial.title: What Makes AmalCare Special
whatMakesUsSpecial.subtitle: FAIRNESS AND QUALITY
whatMakesUsSpecial.description: AmalCare is not a 'ready-made' brokerage company. We are a team of nursing professionals, education experts and interculturally trained companions.
whatMakesUsSpecial.expertise: We know the routine of daily care. We understand the challenges. And we know how integration succeeds.
whatMakesUsSpecial.commitment: We are there. Before entry, on arrival and beyond.

about.title: About AmalCare
about.description: We are a team of nursing professionals, education experts and interculturally trained companions who connect care responsibly.
about.description1: AmalCare eG is a registered cooperative in Germany. It was founded by nursing professionals and executives from the healthcare sector who know the diaconal nursing routine - both outpatient and inpatient - from their own experience.
about.description2: Our idea: a personnel placement agency that does more. One that prepares, accompanies and integrates - instead of just placing. And one where we can say with a clear conscience: "We would hire this professional ourselves."
about.uniqueDescription: AmalCare combines language promotion, nursing skills training and social integration into an overall concept - unique in its form and quality.
about.ctaText: Would you like to learn more about our unique approach?

languageSchool.title: Language School in Rabat
languageSchool.description: Intensive German language training in Morocco to prepare nursing professionals for their career in Germany.

nursingKnowledge.title: Nursing Knowledge Before Entry
nursingKnowledge.description: Comprehensive nursing education and certification before arrival, ensuring professionals are fully prepared.

personalSupport.title: Personal Support in Germany
personalSupport.description: Dedicated personal support throughout the integration process in Germany, from arrival to career development.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Through Participation
qualityAssurance.description: Quality assurance through active participation and feedback from both professionals and healthcare facilities.

ourCommitment.title: Our Commitment
ourCommitment.description: Our commitment to excellence in every aspect of recruitment, training, and integration.

whoWeServe.title: Who We Serve
whoWeServe.description: Supporting both Moroccan nursing professionals seeking opportunities and German healthcare facilities seeking qualified staff.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Whether you're a healthcare facility in Germany seeking qualified nursing professionals, or a Moroccan nurse looking for opportunities abroad, we're here to help.
contact.addressLine1: N°3 imm 9 rue Moulay Idriss Al Akbar Rabat Hassan
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact.privacyNotice: By submitting this form, you agree to our privacy policy and terms of service.
contact.introDescription1: Would you like to learn more about AmalCare eG? Do you have questions about our placement model, are interested in cooperation, or would like to know how we specifically prepare nursing professionals from Morocco for German nursing practice? Then you're in exactly the right place.
contact.introDescription2: Whether you are a nursing professional or trainee from Morocco who wants to work or learn in Germany - or whether you represent a nursing facility that is looking for qualified and reliably prepared staff: We are happy to be personally available for you.
contact.introDescription3: AmalCare accompanies people on their professional path - and organizations in building strong nursing teams. Write to us. Call us. Or arrange a personal conversation directly. We look forward to hearing from you.
contact.introDescription4: Whether nursing professional or facility - we are happy to be there for you.
contact.contactPersonDescription: Get in touch with our team for personalized assistance and support.
